## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I'm trying to preconvert some currencies into Bridge.vETH, but I'm not sure about the process. Can you walk me through it?

**AI Assistant:**
You can preconvert currencies into Bridge.vETH by following these steps: click on the currency you want to preconvert, go to the correct tab where you have the currency stored, click "Send", then "Convert or Cross-chain", then click "Pre-convert". Then, you fill in the recipient address, amount, and currency to convert to (Bridge.vETH), and click send. Do you have any questions about these steps or would you like me to clarify anything?

**User:**
That sounds straightforward. Will I receive the converted Bridge.vETH immediately after preconverting?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you will not receive the converted Bridge.vETH immediately after preconverting. According to the instructions, you will receive an amount of the 100,000 initial supply of Bridge.vETH in your destination address on Friday, 20 Oct. So, there's a bit of a delay between preconverting and receiving the Bridge.vETH. Do you have any other questions about this process?

**User:**
One more question. Can I preconvert currencies into Bridge.vETH without specifying a recipient address?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you cannot preconvert currencies into Bridge.vETH without specifying a recipient address. The instructions specify that you need to fill in the recipient address, which can be "self" or another address of your choice. So, make sure you have that information ready when you're going through the preconversion process. If you have any more questions or need further clarification, feel free to ask!
What is the process to preconvert currencies into Bridge.vETH?

You can preconvert currencies into Bridge.vETH by clicking on the currency you want to preconvert, going to the correct tab where you have the currency stored, clicking "Send", then "Convert or Cross-chain", then clicking "Pre-convert". Then, you fill in the recipient address, amount, and currency to convert to (Bridge.vETH), and click send.

Click on the currency you want to preconvert into Bridge.vETH. Go to the correct tab where you have the currency stored. Click “Send”, then “Convert or Cross-chain”, then click “Pre-convert”.
Recipient address: This is the address where you will receive the Bridge.vETH, you can click on “self”, or choose something else.
Amount: choose the amount of the currency you want to convert into Bridge.vETH.
Currency to convert to: Fill in Bridge.vETH (not case sensitive)
Then click send and follow the steps. You have now preconverted currencies into Bridge.vETH!
On Friday 20 Oct you will receive an amount of the 100,000 initial supply of Bridge.vETH in your destination address.
You can always check verus.io/eth-bridge for statistics on Bridge.vETH
